name: Mission Action
description:
Cooperation TPS playable from 1 to 4 players using network.

The goal is to defeat all the enemies, no respawn allowed for now.

Many improvements will come :

  • Gameplay improvement
  • Controls modification
  • New maps
  • IA improvement
  • Sound design
  • New weapons, inventory
  • Steam integration
  • etc

All the project is done using ue4 and only blueprint, the goal of this project is to learn the engine without the cpp complexity.

Controls : 

  • movements : zqsd
  • fire : left click
  • zoom : middle click
  • crouch : left ctrl
  • walk / jog : f
